sentence.Network_en: Periodicity of nuclear properties began to show up.

sentence.Network_en: Regular irregularities occur with constant periodicity and are usually associated with partial heart block.

sentence.Network_en: There was a primary periodicity of about 2.8 years for snow cover.
sentence.Network_cn: 天山山区积雪变化以2.8a左右的周期为主.
